item.title: About
item.description:
About Me

Hey, thanks for stopping by!üëã

I write about machine learning and optimization‚Äîmostly diving into the theory behind them. I try to stick to English, but sometimes I‚Äôll switch it up with Chinese since it‚Äôs my native tongue. Hope you enjoy hanging out here on my blog!

For more details regarding my research, please visit my academic homepage.

Timeline

  • 2020.7.24 : I got my personal domain sihanwei.org on Netlify for $10.99/year, finally replacing the default *.netlify.app URL.
  • 2020.6.27 : I moved my blog from Github Pages to Netlify. I am way too lazy to build and deploy the website on my own.
  • 2017 - 2018 : I discovered GitHub Pages and Hexo during my senior year while trying to build an academic homepage to boost my grad school applications. I eventually went with Hugo ‚Äî it‚Äôs fast, simple, and, let‚Äôs face it, pretty cool.

item.title: Subscribe
item.description:

    Copy the feed URL above and paste it into your favorite RSS reader.

üõ†Ô∏è Recommended RSS Readers

  • Feedly ‚Äì Clean, cloud-based, and free

RSS is a simple, privacy-friendly way to follow blogs ‚Äî no email or accounts required.
